name: General
description: General purpose prompts suitable for any industry or role

prompts.title: Professional Email Response
prompts.content:
Write a professional email response to the following message. The response should be from [Your Name] at [Company Name], maintaining a [Tone: formal/friendly/assertive] tone.

Original message:
[Paste Original Email]

Key points to address:
[List Key Points]

Desired outcome:
[Desired Outcome]

prompts.title: Meeting Summary Template
prompts.content:
Create a comprehensive meeting summary based on the following details:

Meeting Title: [Meeting Title]
Date: [Date]
Attendees: [List Attendees]
Duration: [Duration]

Key Discussion Points:
[List Discussion Points]

Decisions Made:
[List Decisions]

Action Items:
[List Action Items with Owners and Due Dates]

Format the summary professionally with clear sections for: Overview, Key Discussions, Decisions, Action Items, and Next Steps.

prompts.title: Project Status Report Generator
prompts.content:
Generate a project status report for [Project Name] at [Company Name].

Reporting Period: [Start Date] to [End Date]
Project Manager: [Name]

Current Status: [On Track/At Risk/Behind Schedule]

Key Accomplishments:
[List Accomplishments]

Upcoming Milestones:
[List Milestones with Dates]

Risks and Issues:
[List Risks]

Budget Status: [Budget Information]

Create a professional report suitable for executive review.

prompts.title: SWOT Analysis Framework
prompts.content:
Conduct a comprehensive SWOT analysis for [Company/Product/Initiative Name].

Context:
[Provide Background Context]

Market Position: [Current Market Position]
Key Competitors: [List Competitors]

Analyse and provide detailed insights for:
1. Strengths - Internal positive attributes
2. Weaknesses - Internal areas for improvement
3. Opportunities - External factors to leverage
4. Threats - External challenges to address

Conclude with strategic recommendations based on the analysis.

prompts.title: Interview Question Generator
prompts.content:
Generate interview questions for a [Job Title] position at [Company Name].

Role Level: [Junior/Mid/Senior/Executive]
Department: [Department]

Required Skills:
[List Required Skills]

Key Responsibilities:
[List Responsibilities]

Company Values: [List Values]

Generate questions covering:
1. Technical competency
2. Behavioural assessment
3. Cultural fit
4. Problem-solving ability
5. Leadership potential (if applicable)

Include suggested answer frameworks for interviewers.

prompts.title: Change Management Communication
prompts.content:
Draft a change management communication for [Organisation Name] regarding [Change Initiative].

Type of Change: [Organisational/Process/Technology/Policy]
Affected Teams: [List Teams]
Implementation Timeline: [Timeline]

Key Benefits:
[List Benefits]

Potential Concerns:
[List Known Concerns]

Support Available:
[List Support Resources]

Create communications for:
1. Initial announcement
2. FAQ document
3. Manager talking points
4. Follow-up communication
